title: Would you ever...
body:
... name your child after a League character? 

If so, which one?

If not, why?

P.S. 
I did. ^_^

replies.body:
I am gonna have a child and call her Renekton, with the middle name Azir. Everyday I will dress her in an alligator skin suit decorated with feathers.
Also, she will kill dogs which will all be called Nasus.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eMjQEFdF,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-01-04T09:32:56.101+0000)
>
> Also, she will kill dogs which will all be called Nasus.

Looks like my dog's going to need a new name...

i will name my child rek sai 

{{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}}

my daughters nick name is evie. so close to eve.

and zeb is my son, close to zed.
I'd call my daughter Fiddlesticks... But that just sounds like a horrible porn star name...
I always thought Jayce was a nice name, not sure why I like it.
Indeed, although if I have a son, I will have to fight every temptation not to call him Draven. {{champion:119}}
If one of my children ended up with the same name as a LoL character it wouldn't be intentional.
